Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class TeamLobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.TeamLobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MuteToggle, GUIController, LobbyController
public class TeamLobbyController extends Object implements LobbyController
This class is the controller of the team lobby screen.
